docs.snippet: SANTA MONICA, Calif. With the weathered grayness of an Eastern college town in winter, the pinched and unfashionable block runs into the glare of the Pacific Ocean on the line between Santa Monica and Los Angeles. One colorless two-family Cape Cod...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTA MONICA, Calif. With the weathered grayness of an Eastern college town in winter, the pinched and unfashionable block runs into the glare of the Pacific Ocean on the line between Santa Monica and Los Angeles. One colorless two-family Cape Cod house has no names on the chilly porch's two salt-corroded mailboxes. The upstairs couple are Jane Fonda and her husband of just over a year, radical leader Tom Hayden.
docs.abstract: Article on Jane Fonda, recently married to antiwar activist Tom Hayden, who through her lifestyle is attempting to link her acting career with her pol beliefs; illus (L)

headline.main: Fonda: A person of many parts; A restless yawing between extremes

docs.snippet: She has a full mane of copper hair, talks a mile-a-minute and gestures exuberantly. Officially, she is the Baroness Guy de Rothschild. But to friends and to France, she is simply Marie-Heline, and in the last few years she has emerged as the queen...
docs.lead_paragraph: She has a full mane of copper hair, talks a mile-a-minute and gestures exuberantly. Officially, she is the Baroness Guy de Rothschild. But to friends and to France, she is simply Marie-Heline, and in the last few years she has emerged as the queen bee of French society-her country's extroverted answer to Jacqueline Onassis.
docs.abstract: Int on interests and family; por (L)

headline.main: 'Not All That Social,' the Baroness Insists

docs.lead_paragraph: THIS is my Hollywood chapter because it is no good to write an actor's book without a Hollywood chapter. Even you never went there. Which is not my case; I been. My fires were lighted when I saw "The Goddess," starring Kim Stanley. I cried like a baby, during and after.
